prompt: A minimal interior scene with a soft gradient of teal tones from light at the top to deep at the bottom, created through the natural interplay of light and shadow on walls and furnishings, viewed straight-on. The room features subtle pixel-like textural details in the decor and surfaces, such as fabric or tiles, but no actual patterns or graphics. The space is uncluttered, inviting, and designed for versatility, with gentle transitions in color and a calm, serene atmosphere. No text, no posters, no screens, no abstract shapes.

A professional Asian woman engineer stands confidently in a spotless laboratory, wearing a white lab coat and protective gloves, surrounded by laboratory benches, glassware, and equipment. The environment is bright and meticulously organized, with subtle variations in background details such as different scientific instruments, storage shelves, and lab colleagues engaged in their own tasks. No screens, text, or abstract elements present.

A confident Hispanic man in business attire stands in an active industrial manufacturing setting, surrounded by machinery, stacks of materials, and workers in the background. The scene features a variety of industrial elements like conveyor belts, pallets, and safety signage on walls or equipment (no text). Lighting is natural or slightly dramatic, with subtle changes in the arrangement of machinery and worker positions for visual variety. No tech devices, screens, or text.

A professional Black woman in a semiconductor facility, dressed in full safety gear including a cleanroom suit, gloves, and safety glasses, stands in a well-lit, ultra-clean industrial environment. The background includes real-world semiconductor equipment, stainless steel surfaces, and other workers in similar attire. Variations include different equipment layouts, subtle changes in lighting, and the presence of colleagues at work, ensuring a consistent, realistic cleanroom atmosphere. No screens, text, posters, or abstract elements.

A group of professionals working together in a spacious, contemporary laboratory, surrounded by advanced scientific instruments and equipment related to physics. The team is engaged in animated discussion and collaboration, with diverse individuals in lab coats and safety gear, interacting with real-world laboratory tools. The environment features clean lines, glass walls, and subtle industrial accents, with natural and artificial lighting creating a vibrant and dynamic atmosphere. No screens, text, or abstract elements present.

A professional manufacturing engineer stands confidently in a bright, spotless industrial facility, smiling. The background shows organized equipment, workbenches, and shelves with tools, all arranged neatly. The engineer wears a crisp uniform and safety gear, such as a hard hat and safety glasses. Natural and artificial lighting create a clean, inviting atmosphere. Add subtle variety with different equipment or layout details in the background, while keeping the overall environment consistently tidy and professional.
